question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. green street sign
B. white bus
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white bus is in the mid-ground, while the green street sign is clearly in the far background, making the depth relationship obvious without a depth map.
